attributes.review: The app kept glitching- not letting me use it at all. Now I can’t even open the app. Just in general, there is no point to this app so might as well not even bother downloading it !!! 🥰
attributes.title: Don’t waste your time

attributes.review: Thought Mr orange Cheeto would have something good for us but this app took a WEEK to download and when It downloaded it started giving off a FOUL smell just like Mr Cheeto himself 0/10 would not recommend it’s a waste of time
attributes.title: Oh to see without my eyes ➖👄➖

attributes.review:

attributes.review:
This is one of the most poorly written apps I’ve ever had on my phone. It looks like Steve Jobs came back from the dead. Glitches all the time. Would rate 0 stars if I could.

attributes.title: Terrible

attributes.review: The big Cheeto man (or women still not sure) doesn’t support black lives matter and now he is going to take down tik tok! Also the way he handled Iran and covid-19. Our only hope is that he gets corona and dies

attributes.review: This app took 8 hours to download. And my phone has crashed 14 times just by opening it!!! Remove this app already. I just wanted to support our 🟠 president Mr. Trump how am I supposed to do that when The app doesn’t work??? Btw Mr. Trump all apps matter 😘
attributes.title: HORRIBLE!!!!!

attributes.review: This app takes for everrrr to download and I don’t have a phone # so it makes it hard for me to sign up , it also includes fake news and more . I am disgusted that this app is let onto the App Store I’m disgusted
attributes.title: I’m horrified

attributes.review: At first, I thought it was going to be decent. But I was proven wrong. After I got on it, my screen slowly started to turn yellow and began to show me content of white uneducated men yelling “dishwasher” and calling everyone ❄️ and then rage about a statue. 😤 not cool.
attributes.title: Awful
